resources.string: Let people who want to get married know each other.
The information can only be obtained once a day, please select your gender correctly, change the information push, you need to set up one day in advance.

Instructions:
 You can fill in the ID number of common social software. In order to prevent phone harassment, it is recommended that you do not fill in the phone number directly.
 You can also fill in your own advantage. The limit is 500 words.
 This information will be stored in your personal database for easy publishing and use
It can be published once a day and will be automatically deleted when the number of views reaches the limit.

*Post irrelevant information, after the confirmation, the account will be permanently prohibited from posting.

 *You can get to know each other through this app, but you donâ€™t know if they actually exist. If you want to date, it is recommended to go with your family. Any request for payment should be rejected. good luck.
